messages.update:
Interested in hosting your own server? Go to Akliz High Performance Hosting and use coupon code mechmagic for 20% off your first month.


Please report all issues or concerns on our GitHub or our Discord

Offical pack server! ip: mechandmagic.com:8182

mod.name: Multiplayer Servers
mod.description: Includes the Official Pack Server! WARNING: This will overwrite your servers

mod.name: Actually Additions
mod.description: Do you want Automation? Wireless Transport? Better Machines? A cup o' Coffee? Chests? Better Hoppers? Leaf Blowers? Faster Growth? Plants? Well, Actually Additions has all that and a lot more!

mod.name: Akashic Tome
mod.description: The book of books.

mod.name: Applied Energistics 2
mod.description: A Mod about Matter, Energy and using them to conquer the world..

mod.name: Aquaculture
mod.description: Welcome to Aquaculture! An expansion of Minecraft's fishing system.

mod.name: Bailey's Dailies
mod.description: Daily quests for hunting, gathering, and exploring the wonderful world of Minecraft.

mod.name: Baubles
mod.description: Adding a touch of bling to Minecraft

mod.name: BiblioCraft
mod.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware, fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables, enchanted plates, map frames, and seats!

mod.name: Block Drops
mod.description: Block Drops (JEI Addon)

mod.name: Blood Magic: Alchemical Wizardry
mod.description: Rituals, spells, and more!

mod.name: Guide-API
mod.description: Simple mod guide creation.

mod.name: Botania
mod.description: Botania is a mod that adds nature magic to Minecraft. This time with a fancy number in front.

mod.name: Chickens
mod.description: Chickens... lots of chickens.

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: Adds in tons of fancy blocks for decoration, crafted using the Chisel.

mod.name: Chisels & Bits
mod.description: a mod about Sculpting, Decorating and Aesthetics

mod.name: Cooking for Blockheads
mod.description: Adds a cooking book and multiblock kitchens that only shows recipes you can make with what you currently have in your inventory.

mod.name: Craft Tweaker
mod.description: Customize your minecraft experience!

mod.name: Custom Main Menu
mod.description: Allows you to edit the mainmenu using json

mod.name: Cyberware
mod.description: Augmentation in Minecraft

mod.name: Cyclic
mod.description: Random things that are useful and fun, including powerful items, inventory features, world generation, a few machines, gameplay tweaks, and more. See config to disable absolutely anything. Report issues to https://github.com/PrinceOfAmber/Cyclic/issues

mod.name: Dark Utilities
mod.description: A mod that adds a bunch of new utilities to the game.

mod.name: DeepResonance
mod.description: Power generation based on resonanting crystals

mod.name: Draconic Evolution
mod.description: Draconic Evolution is a mod that adds some extremely expensive high tier items to the game.

mod.name: Drawers & Bits
mod.description: Specialized storage drawers for Chisels & Bits.

mod.name: Embers
mod.description: Dwarven-style Magitech Mod

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: Compact conduits, painted things and all sorts of stuff and bling.

mod.name: Ender-Rift
mod.description: The Powered Bottomless Storage System

mod.name: EnderStorage
mod.description: Stores your stuff in the END! Credits: Ecu - original idea, design, chest and pouch texture Rosethorns - tank model Soaryn - tank texture Supporters: Blkdragon112

mod.name: EnderTanks
mod.description: Store liquids inside a subspace pocket located in the End.

mod.name: Environmental Tech
mod.description: Environmental Tech is a mod containing a vast selection of multiblock machines. Ranging from multiblock solar panels, lightning rods to multiblock Void mining machines. This mod is still in the very early stages and has a lot more to come.

mod.name: EvilCraft
mod.description: An evil mod for Minecraft.

mod.name: Extra Alchemy
mod.description: An expansion on vanilla alchemy

mod.name: Extra Utilities 2
mod.description: A bunch of useful things.

mod.name: Extreme Reactors
mod.description: Adds large, multiblock power generation machines to Minecraft. Compatible with Redstone Flux (RF) and Tesla power. This is a port of the 1.7.10 mod Big Reactors from ErogenousBeef

mod.name: Flat Colored Blocks
mod.description: A Minecraft mod about building with vast quantities of colored blocks.

mod.name: Fast Leave Decay
mod.description: Makes leave decay faster

mod.name: Flux Networks
mod.description: Create Wireless Energy Networks

mod.name: Forestry
mod.description: Trees, bees and more.

mod.name: Hatchery
mod.description: Dont waste those eggs anymore! Become your own chicken farmer!

mod.name: Immersive Engineering
mod.description: A retro-futuristic tech mod!

mod.name: Integrated Dynamics
mod.description: Take full and automated control of your appliances.

mod.name: Integrated Tunnels
mod.description: Transfer other stuff over Integrated Dynamics networks

mod.name: Iron Backpacks
mod.description: Adds tiered backpacks and a system of modular upgrades to go with them!

mod.name: Iron Chest
mod.description: New chests with larger sizes, with in-place upgrade items. The feature chest is the crystal chest, which is transparent - some inventory contents are visible without opening the chest

mod.name: JEI Bees
mod.description: Adds JEI recipes that show breeding and products from Forestry bees, trees and butterflies.

mod.name: Just Enough Items
mod.description: Simple recipe and item helper.

mod.name: Just Enough Resources
mod.description: Adds Resources and Mob Drops to JEI

mod.name: LightningCraft
mod.description: Harnessing the raw power of lightning to make machines, tools, and more to shape the world to your whim

mod.name: Literal Ascension
mod.description: Adds intuitive solutions for vertical mobility.

mod.name: MalisisDoors
mod.description: Better doors!

mod.name: More Bees
mod.description: Adds more bees to forestry

mod.name: Mod Tweaker
mod.description: ModTweaker is an addon for CraftTweaker, a recipe manipulator utility for Minecraft. It allows you to modify the recipes of other mods that add their own crafting mechanics

mod.name: More Chickens
mod.description: Adds Tinkers Construct and Draconic Evolution chickens for Chickens Mod

mod.name: More Furnaces
mod.description: Three new furnaces: Iron, Gold, Obsidian and Diamond Furnace.

mod.name: Morph-o-Tool
mod.description: The wrench to end all wrenches.

mod.name: Natura
mod.description: Heyo, Redwood trees! Chop them all day long!

mod.name: Nomadic Tents
mod.description: Pocket dimensions -- set up your tent and keep everything in it!

mod.name: OpenComputers
mod.authors: Florian 'Sangar' Nuecke,Johannes 'Lord Joda' Lohrer,Everyone who contributed to the mod on Github - thank you!
mod.description: This mod adds modular computers and robots that can be programmed in Lua.

mod.name: Ore Generator
mod.description: One Mod for generating all ModOres

mod.name: Pam's HarvestCraft
mod.description: Expanding minecraft's food system.

mod.name: Progressive Automation
mod.description: A mod that adds automation that can be built in the early game and upgraded throughout late game.

mod.name: Psi
mod.description: Psionic SpellCasting Instruments

mod.name: Quark
mod.description: Small things.

mod.name: Railcraft
mod.description: Redefine your rails

mod.name: Random Things
mod.description: Random Things packed into one Mod.

mod.name: Realistic Terrain Generation
mod.description: Adds a new world type which generates realistic terrain for Overworld biomes.

mod.name: Recall Stones
mod.description: Mod that adds different types of Recall Stones for teleporting around the place

mod.name: Redstone Paste
mod.description: Adds a paste form of redstone, which can stick to various surfaces.

mod.name: Refined Storage
mod.description: An elegant solution to your hoarding problem

mod.name: Reliquary
mod.description: Two words: magical swag. Oh, and a gun.

mod.name: Resource Loader
mod.description: Allows mod pack creators / users to add their own custom textures to minecrafts resources without making a resource pack.

mod.name: RFTools
mod.description: RedFlux tools

mod.name: Roots
mod.description: Druidic Magic Mod

mod.name: Runes of Wizardry
mod.description: Magic. Runes. And dust. Lots of dusts.

mod.name: Signals
mod.description: Mod that adds OpenTTD style signaling and more!

mod.name: Simply Jetpacks 2
mod.description: Redstone Flux jetpacks and more

mod.name: Soul Shards - The Old Ways
mod.description: Custom spawners for any mob!

mod.name: Spartan Shields
mod.description: Spartan Shields adds a variety of new shields to Minecraft.

mod.name: Storage Drawers
mod.description: Multi-drawer storage blocks for quick storage and retrieval.

mod.name: Steve's Carts 2
mod.description: A carttastic mod adding a near infinite number of carts possible to the game, through the creation of modular carts.

mod.name: Super Crafting Frame
mod.description: An item frame that can craft items when punched.

mod.name: Super Circuit Maker
mod.description: Ever wanted to build custom logic gates and complex circuits? Now you can!

mod.name: TechReborn
mod.description: TechReborn, The Gregtech revival you dream about on a cool mid summer's eve.

mod.name: Tinkers' Construct
mod.description: A little of this, a little of that, a lot of tinkering, and a lot of tools

mod.name: Tinker I/O
mod.description: Smeltery Upgrade!

mod.name: Tinkers Tool Leveling
mod.description: A small mod that gives your tools XP and awards extra modifiers on levelup

mod.name: The One Probe
mod.description: A Probe to rule them all!

mod.name: Tomb Many Graves
mod.description: Stores your stuff when you bite the dust.

mod.name: UniDict
mod.description: a mod about unifying all the things.

mod.name: Water Strainer
mod.description: Adds water strainers to filter water for common resources.

mod.name: Wireless Crafting Grid
mod.description: Refined Storage addons that adds a wireless version of the crafting grid

mod.name: Woot
mod.description: The alternative mob spawner/grinder system

mod.name: YABBA
mod.description: Yet Another Better Barrel Attempt

mod.name: Bad Wither No Cookie!
mod.description: A simple mod to silence the Wither and Dragon broadcast sounds

mod.name: Foam Fix
mod.description: FoamFix is a mod which makes Minecraft go fast - by which I mean use less memory

mod.name: Item Scroller
mod.description: Move items in inventory GUIs by scrolling the mouse wheel over slots with items in them

mod.name: JourneyMap
mod.description: JourneyMap Unlimited Edition: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore. JourneyMap API: v1.9.4-1.2. Built: 2016-06-30-01:09:28.

mod.name: MoreOverlays
mod.description: Adds some overlays from NEI (Mob spawns, Chunk Bounds, Item Search)

mod.name: Optifine
mod.description: It allows Minecraft to run faster and look better with full support for HD textures and many configuration options.

mod.name: Roguelike Dungeons
mod.description: Adds randomized dungeons to the world

mod.name: Surge
mod.description: A tweak mod that improves Minecraft performance and stability.

mod.name: Waila
mod.description: Waila (What Am I Looking At) is a UI improvement mod aimed at providing block information directly ingame.

mod.name: Waila Harvestability
mod.description: An add-on for Waila that adds information about the harvestability of what you are looking at

mod.name: What Are We Looking At
mod.description: Greatly expands upon the amount of information provided by the Waila HUD, along with bridging support between Waila and many other minecraft mods!

mod.name: Login Shield
mod.description: protects users from taking damage between when they login and they can start interacting with the world

mod.name: AutoRegLib
mod.description: Automatically item, block, and model registration for mods.

mod.name: Bookshelf
mod.description: Bookshelf is a core/library mod, which adds new features and tools into the game for other content creators to work with. The primary focus of this project is to make use of the combined strength of the modded community to create wonderful tools that everyone can use.

mod.name: Brandon's Core
mod.description: This is the core mod that will be used by most of my mods from now on

mod.name: Chameleon
mod.description: Shared code and render support for mods. Used by jaquadro's mods.

mod.name: CodeChicken Core 1.8.+
mod.description: Code Chicken Core

mod.name: CodeChicken Lib
mod.description: CodeChickenLib is a library of systems to help make various aspects of minecraft modding easier. It contains libraries for 3D math and transformations, model rendering, packets, config, colours, asm and a few other things..

mod.name: CommonCapabilities
mod.description: Forge Capabilities that can be shared by multiple mods

mod.name: Cyclops Core
mod.description: Coremod for EvilCraft, Integrated Dynamics and others.

mod.name: CXLibrary
mod.description: Shared code for my mods.

mod.name: ElecCore | Rendering Library
mod.description: Shared code for Forge mods

mod.name: EnderCore
mod.description: Library mod used by EnderIO, EnderZoo, and others

mod.name: Shadowfacts' Forgelin
mod.description: My fork of Emberwalker's Forgelin, with some sprinkles on top.

mod.name: LLibrary
mod.description: The lightweight Minecraft modding library

mod.name: MalisisCore
mod.description: MalisisCore is a framework dedicated to simplify many processes required during a mod development.

mod.name: Mantle
mod.description: Shared code for Slime Knights mods and others.

mod.name: McJtyLib
mod.description: McJtyLib library for RFTools, Deep Resonance, ...

mod.name: MTLib
mod.description: Library files for Minetweaker Addons

mod.name: p455w0rd's Library
mod.description: Library component for all of p455w0rd's mods

mod.name: RebornCore
mod.description: RebornCore, A core set of classes.

mod.name: ShetiPhian-Core
mod.description: Core set of files needed by ShetiPhians mods

mod.name: SonarCore
mod.description: Sonar's Modding Framework

mod.name: Valkyrie Lib
mod.description: Library for all of ValkyrieofNight's Mods

mod.name: WanionLib
mod.description: Shared Code Library Used by (not)all WanionCane mods!

mod.name: Zero CORE
mod.description: Utility mod and multiblock API
